alert.note: Alert for Greene; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oconee, northern Greene, northwestern Taliaferro, west central Wilkes and Oglethorpe Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Penfield, or 7 miles north of Greensboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Crawford, Woodville, Maxeys, Rayle, Stephens, Penfield, Wrayswood, Philomath, Vesta, Point Peter and Hutchings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
